scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a man and a woman, both with halos, presenting a lamb to a kneeling figure. The man, wearing a hat and a robe, holds the lamb with both hands. The woman, veiled, stands behind him, also holding the lamb. The kneeling figure, dressed in simple attire, extends a bowl to receive the offering. In the background, architectural elements suggest a building with arched windows and a roofline. The overall composition suggests a devotional act of offering.
